invite.Title: Invite Server
invite.Body:
Use this link below to add PokeTrainer to another discord server!

[Invite PokeTrainer](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1151657435073875988&permissions=8&integration_type=0&scope=bot)

register.Title: Register Error
register.Body: There was an error while registering your server with PokeTrainer. Please try again or contact us in the [Discord]({0}).

register.Title: Register Error
register.Body: You must register PokeTrainer within a valid server and Text Channel. Please try again or contact us in the [Discord]({0}).

register.Title: Server Registered
register.Body:
Server Name: {0}
Update Channel: <#{1}>

NOTE: For PokeTrainer to work properly in your server, it must be given the following permissions:
- Manage Webhooks
- Send Messages
- Send/Create/Manage Threads
- Embed Links
- Add Reactions
- Manage Messages
- Read Message History

unregister.Title: Server Unregistered
unregister.Body: Updates will now be sent to the first channel where PokeTrainer can send messages. If it cannot send messages to any channel, it will leave the server on the next update. To receive updates in a specific channel again, use the **/register** command.
